reviews.review: fun
Why this game so good?

Alright, I've been thinking; when life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I DON'T WANT YOUR DAMN LEMONS!! WHAT AM I SUPPOSED TO DO WITH THESE!?!?

Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM!?!? I'M THE MAN WHO'S GONNA BURN YOUR HOUSE DOWN!! WITH THE LEMONS!!!

I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a COMBUSTIBLE LEMON THAT BURNS YOUR HOUSE DOWN!!!!!
NO WHITE PEOPLE AS FOR NOW , JUST ROBOTS
jump in portal do wooshy woosh

I bought this game years ago after enjoying Portal one and playing the Co-Op with my brother. It took me a few years to get back to it, this time, alone. In that way I kind of felt like Chel. Seeing the test chambers again I felt oddly nostalgic whilst running for my life from a crazed robot. 
We had some good times!

之前买v社包就附赠了一直没玩，昨天没事干玩了一（这个假期太漫长，最近玩啥都不在心思上了。。也就动森能玩很久。。），于是今天二通了，感觉很棒，不仅是在游戏性上还有就是剧情，一代中的剧情和二代完美衔接，但过程中有好多细节令人细思极恐。。。感觉我玩的是恐怖游戏2333，总之超级棒就是了，最重要的是想问下g胖”啥时候出三啊（我在想桃子吃没错！！！）“

Hilarious narration, enticing puzzles and a co-op mode best enjoyed with a friend makes one of my top games of all time!
You won't regret it. 
P.S. As a bonus after having completed the story and co-op modes I've discovered a whole world of additional levels created by users - the game workshop used to make them is also good fun.
its cool

Прекрасное продолжение первой части - более длинное, больше загадок, больше элементов для взаимодействия. При этом юмор ни чуть не пострадал (возможно стал еще лучше).
Возможность кооперативной игры и куча карт в мастерской - просто killer feature.
Прекрасная покупка как для себя, так и в подарок,
